pizza.title: Cheese Lover
pizza.description: A delightful pizza loaded with extra cheese for all cheese lovers.

pizza.title: Cheesy
pizza.description: A classic cheesy pizza with a perfect blend of mozzarella and cheddar.

pizza.title: Cheesy Tomato
pizza.description: A delicious combination of melted cheese and fresh tomato slices.

pizza.title: Paneer Pizza
pizza.description: A rich and flavorful pizza topped with spicy marinated paneer cubes.

pizza.title: Sausage Delight
pizza.description: A meaty treat with juicy sausage slices and a smoky BBQ sauce.

pizza.title: Spicy Veg Paneer
pizza.description: A fiery combination of spicy paneer, capsicum, and chili flakes.

pizza.title: Veg Masala
pizza.description: A flavorful veggie pizza with a unique blend of Indian spices.

pizza.title: Veg Supreme
pizza.description: A supreme veggie feast with olives, capsicum, mushrooms, and onions.
